description: Triangular array formed from elements to right of middle of Pascal's triangle.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..200 of triangle, flattened
prog: (Haskell)a014413 n k = a014413_tabf !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a014413_row n = a014413_tabf !! (n-1)a014413_tabf = [1] : f 1 [1] where   f 0 us'@(_:us) = ys : f 1 ys where                    ys = zipWith (+) us' (us ++ [0])   f 1 vs@(v:_) = ys' : f 0 ys where                  ys@(_:ys') = zipWith (+) (vs ++ [0]) ([v] ++ vs)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 24 2015
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
